nodes.text: Ahsoka: A Star Wars Rebels Cinestory Comic

Ahsoka: A Star Wars Rebels Cinestory Comic was a planned Star Wars Rebels television adaptation comic book focussed on Ahsoka Tano. Intended to be released on August 6, 2019, it was cancelled after publisher Joe Books Ltd filed for bankruptcy.

The Ghost crew is reeling from two shocking revelations-that they are part of a much larger rebellion, and that their informant Fulcrum is none other than Ahsoka Tano, Anakin Skywalker's former Padawan. As the rebels continue their fight against the Empire, they hurtle toward a devastating confrontation with its most fearsome agent-Darth Vader.
Retrace Ahsoka's journey in the cinestory comic adaptation of her story in Disney XD's Star Wars Rebels.
